Other Information.Additional Info: Polysulfides are repelled due to electrostatic repulsion from sulfonic groups and size exclusion by the pore structure.

Sieving Mechanism: Molecular sieving at sub-nanometer scale combined with electrostatic repulsion

Experimental Validation.Method: Permeation test, GCD profiles, CV measurements
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Retention of transparency over 48 hours in permeation test; discharge capacity: 1127.4 mA h g⁻¹ at 0.1C; capacity retention: 75.5% over 200 cycles

Other Information.Additional Info: The UiO-66-S/Naņon hybrid-coated separator suppresses polysulfide shuttling and enhances redox kinetics of sulfur conversion.
